body_content.explanation: the quality of being physically violent and frightening:
examples: He pulled my face to his with a sudden fierceness.
Leaked video clips from soldiers in the field have brought home the fierceness of the fighting.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being strong and powerful:
examples: The fierceness of the storm was unexpected.
Firefighters were unable to reach the woman because of the fierceness of the flames.

body_content.explanation: involving strong feeling or energetic activity:
examples: I was impressed by the fierceness of his desire to win.
Laurie brings a fierceness to the role that one would have never predicted from his past work.
